product_highlights: Global leader in safety science and certification
Comprehensive product safety and compliance audits
Quality system and regulatory compliance verification
Supply chain transparency and ethical sourcing audits
notes: Underwriters Laboratories (UL) is a global leader in safety science and certification services. They provide comprehensive auditing for cosmetics manufacturers including product safety audits, regulatory compliance verification, and sustainability certification. UL's expertise in environmental claims verification helps brands substantiate and verify sustainability marketing claims.
